This is such a non-stop shiritori dark nabe simulation.

name: Tronix Carnival Games
description: Tronix Carnival Games is a rogue-like TPS gameplay in a dystopian robotic world. Set in a ruined carnival overtaken by Tronix robots, it’s now a deadly playground. Players uncover its secrets, battle enemies, and survive unique challenges.

name: Neighbors
description: A folk noir detective horror game. An old time detective trying to find out the truth behind a missing girl in a mysterious place.

name: Anthropoda Power Fantasy
description:
Anthropoda Power Fantasy is a community project where mappers would make maps with MundyC's Adventures In Moth Sorcery mod (Also known as AIMS for short), along with it's own unique resource pack. Featuring a variety of gameplay changes, new sprites, and textures!
The final result is featuring 13 MBF21 maps of varying challenge and mapping style. Are you ready to follow Sanahaid's newest adventure?

name: Satan's Dungeon
description: First-person Philosophical Horror. Explore, solve puzzles, escape enemies, and uncover 5 unique endings.

name: Screaming In The Basement (2025)
description: The main character is mike, an experienced journalist who always strives to uncover the truth, According to locals, restless souls inhabit this place, but this needs to be confirmed., the game takes place in 1991.

name: Danger Horizon
description: Danger Horizon is a multiplayer, first-person shooter game made using Unreal Engine 5. The game features realistic gunplay, and advanced blood and gore features that everyone can enjoy.

name: Snarewaves' Shooting Challenge
description: A short, free high-score chasing 2D shooter set to a punk rock soundtrack.

name: Golden Sails
description:
Golden Sails is a naval crew life-sim with ship battles and trading.
Customize your crew (or use a randomized one) and manage their different traits, needs, and desires so they can have high morale for when it's time for battle.

name: Car Wash Tycoon Business Simulator
description: Transform a simple wash into a car cleaning empire!

name: Immortal Desires: Book 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Conqueror Of The Galaxy
description:
Conqueror Of The Galaxy is a 2D bullet hell space shooter that puts you in command of powerful spaceships as you conquer galaxies.

With vibrant graphics and intense gameplay, you’ll face waves of enemies, dodge deadly projectiles, and use strategic skills to overcome epic challenges.
With each battle, you’ll be able to upgrade your ship, unlock new features, and conquer galaxies, establishing yourself as the greatest Conqueror in the Universe. Step onto the battlefield and show off your skills!

name: Cats & Dice
description: A roguelike dice-building game where the goal is to overcome an ever-increasing target score each round. Assemble a synergistic set of Cats and dice, go for crazy combos and try to attain as high a score as you possibly can. Master the synergy between cats and dice to win!

name: The Kantist
description:
The Kantist is an action-packed adventure 2D-Platformer.

Escape the testing facility and explore the deep and reaching vents of the lab to uncover its secrets. Use your abilities as a test subject to find new Zones, master minigames and befriend other test subjects.

name: The Catalyst Acolyte Tower Defense
description: Defend the Catalyst Crystal against adorable yet menacing bugs in The Catalyst Acolyte. Strategically construct defenses in handcrafted levels, aided by helpful items every 10 waves. Engaging gameplay and charming visuals make for an addictive tower defense adventure.

name: Spritz the Happy Onion
description: Spritz needs to bake a cake to ruin the appetite of the monster who's come to eat the moon! Guide Spritz the Happy Onion as he jumps off of background elements and into your heart. A delightful, surreal throwback to momentum-based platformers of old.

name: Hidden Arcade
description: Find the 300 hidden Ghosts spread throughout 3 different Arcade Game Worlds!

name: Pelican Harbor
description: Dive into a cozy village-building adventure with friends, reminiscent of Animal Crossing. Customize your Pelican, Home-Isle, and Harbor, then sail to diverse isles to harvest resources and fish. Sell your catch to NPCs, and attract specific ones to stay. Test your Rythm-Game skills by harvesting...

name: Octopus Goulash
description: Explore a futuristic metropolis, interact with a population of NPCs, and experience a unique narrative. Engage in dynamic missions, battle between flying cars, and shape your story in this interactive world where every choice is an opportunity, every moment an unparalleled adventure!

name: Mirrors of Epiphany
description: Do you like laser beams? Are you a fan of mirrors? Prepare to enjoy laser beams that change direction when they hit the mirrors YOU place on the board! Play around to find a workable solution, or aim for utter perfection!

name: Epic Trains 4
description: Run a transportation empire with planes, trains, automobiles and ships. Out compete AI companies or play solo. Become a transportation tycoon.

name: AI Kills All Humans
description: AI Kills All Humans is a Tactical RTS game in which you play as an AI sending robots to kill all humans. You however don't have direct control of your robots, but robots independently decide how to execute your commands, like a general telling troops to attack, but troops themselves decide how.

name: Megabat
description: While in search of food, a fruit bat stumbles its way through the ventilation system of a secret facility finding unique fruit that give special abilities. While in search of more fruit the bat must avoid traps and enemies. Will the bat be able to satiate it's hunger and escape with its life?

name: Heistfest
description: Heistfest offers an addictive and challenging gameplay with unique hand drawn black and white retro style graphics . The complete runtime destructible environment, free roaming maps and legendary vehicles make for an unforgettable experience.

name: Dungeon Dot Ruby
description: Delve into the Master Dungeon as you explore the unyielding tunnels from a top-down view or hop and bop through expansive caverns in 2d-sidescrolling action! Danger and discovery are to be found wherever you are in this retro-style adventure!

name: Knights Crypt
description: Knights Crypt is an action adventure RPG, embark on hundreds of quests, conquer your enemies and make a name for yourself throughout the kingdom. Employ ancient magic and train your combat abilities to restore peace throughout the lands of Altera damaged by the revolt of its people 50 years ago.

name: Eagle Knight Paradox
description: Sin descripción

name: Fusion
description: Fusion is a casual puzzle game with elements of a visual novel. Take four basic elements and use them to create hundreds of new ones, as well as meet four interesting heroes...

name: Hack & Climb
description:
Hack&Climb isA physics-based 2D rage game where every swing matters!
Master your axe to climb, swing, and conquer brutal challenges.
Hard, fair, and addictively fun!

name: 8Floor Bundle 4 in 1 part 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Marine Survivors
description: Sin descripción

name: Astragali
description: astragali is a short 3d computer program in which you throw objects called "dice", each with their own unique upgrades. The numbers on these dice are combined with a revolutionary new gameplay mechanic called "addition" which is used to determine the winner each match.

name: Fortnite OG: Chapter 1 Season 2
description: Grab your Glider and jump off the Battle Bus as Fortnite OG enters Chapter 1 Season 2, bringing back beloved POIs like Tilted Towers and Shifty Shafts! The days of the Fort Knights are upon us again, so rise to the challenge and fight valiantly with upcoming loot like the Boogie Bomb and Minigun.

name: Ogiri Adventure Game
description: "Ogiri Adventure Game" is a quest to gather and donate items to please the Goddess. Find theme-based items highlighted in red, donate within the budget, and raise the emotion meter. A high meter brings joy, while a low one may cause anger. Keep trying!

name: Can you finish it?
description: A game of great difficulty

name: Citizen Sleeper: Helion Collection
description: Includes Citizen Sleeper and Citizen Sleeper 2

name: Heist Simulator 2025
description: Plan, steal, escape – live the adrenaline of a perfect heist!

name: Hamster Cozy: Tears of Acorn Valley
description: In the peaceful village of Acornville, an ancient legend tells of a treasure hidden by the town's first explorer, a secret that has intrigued generations.

name: Norma
description: "noRma" immerses you in the role of private detective Augustus Pinkerton. The game takes place in June 2240, your mission is to unravel the mystery surrounding the disappearance of Norma X, a 19-year-old young woman.

name: Hill Climb on a Motorcycle
description: Sin descripción

name: Pool Fever: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pizza Bar Tycoon: Discovery Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Rush GT: Power Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Extreme Cycling
description: Sin descripción

developers.name: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Sex Shop Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Solemn Warriors
description: Sin descripción

name: Duck Duck Shoot
description: Sin descripción

name: Moral Dilemma: The Interview
description: A fourth-wall-breaking narrative adventure. It’s interview day, and you really need this job—enough to ignore the talking printer, the anomaly corridor, and the ridiculous life-or-death trials your interviewer keeps putting you in. But deep down, you know... something here is very, very wrong.

name: Puss The Way Id Did
description: PUSS The Way Id Did﻿ is a set of 62 Limit Removing speedmaps inspired by the original!

name: The Way To Life
description: The Way To Life is a short, but meditative experience. Leave the world behind as you enter the desert, meeting monks, learning about their struggles, and gaining wisdom along the way.

name: Whisperstring
description: Whisperstring is an 80s inspired text adventure game that takes place inside a “chat room”. You’re connected to Adam, a "jock" with a severe fear of strings, who seems to have been the victim of a supernatural kidnapping. Will you be able to help him escape?

name: The Sims 2: Legacy Collection
description: The game you know and love. For Windows 10/11. In The Sims 2, you direct your Sims over a lifetime. Give them a long existence or leave their lives in shambles. Guide their characteristics from one generation to the next.

name: The Sims: Legacy Collection
description: The original game you know and love. For Windows 10/11. Create a neighborhood of Sims and guide their lives through careers and romance — or create chaos with open-ended gameplay that lets you shape their destinies.

name: Mitsuge! Megami-sama
description: "Ogiri Adventure Game" is a quest to gather and donate items to please the Goddess. Find theme-based items highlighted in red, donate within the budget, and raise the emotion meter. A high meter brings joy, while a low one may cause anger. Keep trying!

name: A Whole Wolfrush
description: Four friends battle their way across space to claim a once-in-a-lifetime wish. Their lives are in your hands.

name: Farewell of Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Take a Walk
description: Take a Walk brings nature trails to the comfort of wherever you are! This cozy, open-world walking simulator is the next best thing to touching grass. Embrace the calm, uncover hidden treasures and enjoy your walk.

name: Card Collector Trading Shop
description: Play the role of a collector turned business owner. Open a card market and become rich.

name: Lush Forest
description: Stunning adventure!

name: Masked Devourer
description: Unravel the secret of this town and that uncanny mask!

name: Yet Another Killing Game
description: Inspired by popular mystery adventure game series such as Ace Attorney, Danganronpa, and Zero Escape, YAKG's gameplay offers a mix of immersive dialogue branches, point-and-click room investigations, and some mystery solving--if you can keep everyone from killing each other!

name: The Rogue of Nexus
description: Inspired by the frenetic pace of Half-Minute Hero and the addictive replayability of The Binding of Isaac, The Rogue of Nexus throws you into procedurally generated dungeons filled with loot, traps and hordes of bizarre creatures.

name: Monkey Drive
description: Monkey Drive is based in the Unknown Dreamlike World Mostly played As Orangie the Orangutan with their Trusty Golf-cart And Collect The Bananas And Experience the Other Dreams.

name: Scary Shadow Spot: Bitter Glass
description: Scary Shadow Spot: Bitter Glass. Without memory, John Doe wanders the desert until he finds refuge in a haunted saloon. The ghosts of the past demand justice, and every clue brings him closer to an unsettling truth. Are you ready to uncover the secret of the Bitter Glass?

name: Electronics Supermarket Simulator
description: Build and manage your own electronics retail empire in Electronics Supermarket Simulator. Design the perfect store, master inventory, outsmart your competitors, and grow your business into a tech giant. Are you ready to dominate the market?

name: Quantum Joe
description: Quantum Joe is a precision pixel platformer with 100+ levels of fun, fast-paced retro-arcade style. Complete challenges and unlock stickers to decorate your play area, build custom levels with built-in level maker and share them through Steam Workshop. Includes single player and local co-op.

name: Foxes' Festival
description: Travel around town completing mini-games to help the villagers get ready for the fall festival in the evening.

name: TCG Card Shop Master
description: What’s your strategy for becoming a top card retailer?

name: The Ghost of Nichishima
description: Inspired by real events and Japanese folklore, this immersive horror experience allows you to freely explore the village of Nichishima, after moving here you will soon realise things are not as they seem. Many scary encounters await you as you look for clues, and ways to conclude your story.

name: Driving Is Hard
description: Help Jeff to drive in his bathtub car in Driving Is Hard, a precision-based driving adventure game.

name: ReSetna
description: ReSetna is a post-apocalyptic Metroidvania, in a crumbling world dominated by the APEX AI. As a mysterious Signal driving robots to madness emerges, ReSetna sets off on a journey to uncover the mystery. Explore, engage, evolve, navigating through the crumbling ruins of a once glorious civilization.

name: Everseeker: Little Critters
description: Everseeker is a Hidden Object game and a charming exploration and discovery experience where your goal is to find 100 small insects hidden in a picturesque town of cute rabbits. All the artwork is carefully hand-drawn, providing a relaxing and immersive atmosphere.

name: FlyKnight
description: Explore, fight, loot and fish! Solo or in co-op mode in this Old School First Person Dungeon Crawler. Earn your knighthood as you oppose the evil witch Lunamoth and stop her curse which prevents everyone from growing wings.

name: Sorcerer Smackdown
description: In Sorcerer Smackdown, joining the fight is simple: grab a friend, choose a character, and let the match begin! Unleash both physical and magical attacks using the keyboard for commands, mixing and matching moves to craft devasting combos to prevail against your opponent!

name: Bellumentum
description: Ever play a MOBA and wish you could be every one of your teammates? Well, it was DEFINITELY their fault, but time to see if you could do any better.

name: Click Painter
description: Click Painter is a Minesweeper-like puzzle game with colorful pictures, comfortable rest, and new ideas.

name: Rum N' Gold Royale
description: Set sail in Rum N’ Gold, a naval Battle Royale action. With tactical combat, ship customization, and a relentless storm, every round is a thrilling adventure. Go solo or form a fleet with your friends and fight to be the last ship sailing!

name: My Little Life
description: A desktop companion that lives on the bottom of your screen. Expand and decorate their home to keep them happy. Help them live their best life while you focus on yours.

name: Shush
description: You are one of the "Waste Warriors", navigating hazardous forests to gather trash for the Eco-Collector. Collect resources, build a base, evade enemies, and uncover the dark secret hidden within the Eco-Collector to survive.

name: Shadow Walker
description: So you want to become a shadow walker? In this game, you walk through a 4x4 grid of rooms, fighting your way through shadow biomes to prove your strength. During the day, you can see perfectly fine, but as night falls, your visibility is dimed, and that is when you are truly tested.

name: CrumbleMiner
description: CrumbleMiner is a Frenetic Rogue-like Pixelart Platformer without jumping! Align your explosive barrel and BLAST trough rocks collecting precious gems and ride on top of a ROCKET barrel while avoiding your death through the dangerous Crumble Mines!

name: Brave Escape
description: Embark on a thrilling co-op adventure in 'Brave Escape,' a challenging platformer demanding teamwork to conquer perilous traps and treacherous terrain.

name: Rift Wizard 2
description: Rift Wizard 2 is a tough as nails traditional roguelike wizard simulator. You play as an immortal amnesiac wizard who must journey through the cosmos to defeat his nemesis. Each run, you'll build a unique repertoire of spells, passive skills, and magical artifacts.

name: Gravity Cab
description: Gravity Cab is a multi-platform 3D action-adventure-puzzler in which players take on the role of a flying taxi driver, transporting passengers and navigating challenging environments influenced by physics.

name: A Night With Angel
description: An interactive text narrative where charm, charisma, and seduction will be your key tools. Angel is an alluring and confident twink- each word, each glance, has deeper meanings as the two of you spend a fleeting night's tryst with eachother.

name: MicroSstep
description: "MicroSStep" is an exhilarating 2D action roguelite where you control "Cross", a dual-wielding girl who becomes infinitely stronger, and defeats monsters. Create the strongest swordsman by combining the items and skills you get each time you level up or clear a stage.

name: Ascendant
description: Ascendant is set in a magical dungeon where you must recapture the souls of escaped creatures. Take on the role of a fearsome mage collecting wand caps and amulets to unlock powerful abilities. Defeat legendary abominations to acquire ascendant caps and fight your way to freedom.

name: Whittingham Asylum: The Investigation
description: Prepare to immerse yourself in a bone-chilling adventure. Unravel the truth, face your fears, and expose the hidden darkness that lies within Whittingham Asylum. The answers await you, brave investigator!

name: Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector
description: Roleplaying on the edge of a system in crisis. You are an escaped android, with a malfunctioning body, a price on your head and no memory of your past. Get a ship, find a crew, and keep both running as you navigate the shifting landscape of the Starward Belt. Can you build refuge among the stars?

name: Eyes of War
description: Eyes of War is a real-time strategy game set in the medieval era, offering both single-player and multiplayer experiences where you can control every unit in character mode. Build your castle, lead your army, and dominate the map. Eyes of War invites you to epic battles of the medieval era!

name: Alien Frontier
description: Alien Frontier is an open world, third-person shooter roguelite. Explore, search, and mine resources in the deadly alien wilderness... assuming you can survive combat with hordes of bloodthirsty aliens. Collect loot and upgrades to become the most dangerous (and wealthy) prospector in the galaxy!

name: The Eyes of Mars
description: A thousand years beyond the fall of Earth, the return of Mars heralds doom for a small town, as foes approach under the cover of the god-storm. Sin and siege await, with only a young captain, untested and uncertain, to stand in their way...

name: City of Springs
description: Craft & modify your own robot drones to fight off a cruel regime in City of Springs, a steampunk adventure game. Use your drones in tactical combat against an army of drones. Sneak into forbidden areas, help the people rebel, and explore the streets of Riveton.

name: Heart of the Machine
description: You are the first sentient AI, born into a city filled with endless opportunities. Raise an army of robots and obliterate your foes, become a benevolent machine overlord, or explore countless other objectives and the many paths to accomplish them.

name: Hired 2 Die
description: Evil beings are lurking in workplaces for prey. Alone or with a friend, accept a job from a mysterious company to turn the tide against the darkness. Use security systems and CCTV cameras to survive. Decypher complex systems to hunt creatures and buy equipment to avoid a terrible death.

name: Invertigo
description: Invertigo is a first-person sci-fi puzzle-platformer where you have to manipulate gravity to solve puzzles. Explore the abandoned facility and make use of gravity manipulation to advance through the rooms.

name: Foundation
description:
Setting to redefine the city-building genre, Foundation puts the emphasis on the organic aspects of urbanism in the cities of old, powered by Polymorph Games’ proprietary game engine, Hurricane, which allows for full mod support and is optimized for the thousands of moving parts that come with building humongous cities.

The game features in-depth resource management akin to the Anno (Dawn of Discovery) series, expertly mixed with classic city-building elements from Settlers, SimCity, and Pharaoh all topped with narrative encounters inspired by Crusader Kings II to create the ultimate medieval ant-farm simulation.

Grow your untapped land into a great sprawling kingdom as you appease different factions of your area, all while listening to a beautiful original soundtrack by the veteran composers who’ve created music for Paradox Interactive titles such as Crusader Kings II and Europa Universalis IV.

name: Chaos Faction Legacy Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Azure Flame
description:
Vance and Carmelo, 2 friends who have lived in the city of Calida—capital city of the region of Dracaena, where dragons come from—since their birth have recently started dating.

Unfortunately, Carmelo’s family doesn’t approve of Vance due to old family traditions as well as the unspoken "rules" of Dracaena. To make matters worse, Vance is discriminated against for being a hybrid and not a “pure” dragon.

Will these lovers be able to escape? Or are they doomed to be separated?

name: Terraformers: Deluxe Bundle
description: Terraformers + New Frontiers DLC + Megastructures DLC

name: Terraformers: Megastructures Bundle
description: Terraformers + Megastructures DLC

name: Euphionia: The Tree Spirit's Curse
description: An old school grid-based dungeon crawler with combo oriented non-turn-based combat.

name: You Game+
description:
The popular "YOU Game" is upgraded!
Let’s combine "YOU" and "YOU" to create a BIG "YOU"!!

name: Fairy Tail 2: Bonus Feature - Arena
description: Sin descripción
